All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Andie
Main class for A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).
BlockAveraging
ImageOperation to apply a Block Average filter.
BrightnessAndContrast
This class is written to implement the Brightness and Contrast operation in ANDIE.
ColourActions
Actions provided by the Colour menu.
ColourWheel
A support class to pick a colour
ConvertToGrey
ImageOperation to convert an image from colour to greyscale.
CreateHotKey
A class that creates hotkeys for the menus in the menuBar.
DrawingActions
You can draw stuff now
DrawingOperations
ImageOperation to apply drawing functions.
EditActions
Actions provided by the Edit menu.
EmbossFilter
This class implements the ImageOperation interface and applies Image embossing to a BufferedImage.
FileActions
Actions provided by the File menu.
FilterActions
Actions provided by the Filter menu.
FilterBorder
Filter border that adds a replication border to images
GaussianFilter
This class implements the ImageOperation interface and applies a Gaussian blur filter to a BufferedImage.
HelpActions
HelpActions class manages a set of actions for the Help menu.
HSV
ImageOperation to edit an image in HSV, making cool changes to colours in the image.
ImageAction
Abstract class representing actions the user might take in the interface.
ImageCrop
ImageCrop to crop an image based on the MouseSelection selection box bounds
ImageFlipHorizontal
ImageFlipHorizontal implements ImageOperation interface and provides functionality to flip an image horizontally.
ImageFlipVertical
ImageFlipVertical implements ImageOperation interface and provides functionality to flip an image vertically.
ImageInvert
ImageOperation to invert an image's colours.
ImageMenuBar
Actions provided by the Image menu.
ImageOperation
Interface for operations to be applied to images.
ImagePanel
UI display element for EditableImages.
ImageResize
ImageOperation to apply a image resize.
ImageRotate
Image Rotation to rotate the images orientation
ImageScaling
ImageScaling class implements the ImageOperation interface and provides functionality to scale an image by a given percentage.
MacroActions
Actions provided by the Action menu.
MeanFilter
ImageOperation to apply a Mean (simple blur) filter.
MedianFilter
ImageOperation to apply a Median filter.
MouseSelection
MouseSelection to apply a selection box to the image panel using the users input of mouse click and release
Pencil
A class that simulates a pencil drawing on a canvas
PreviewPanel
A class that provides common behaviour to implement in the preview panel for all methods that need them.
PrintImage
Prints the current image.
RandomScattering2
ImageOperation to apply the Random scattering effect on an image.
RGBSwapping
This class is designed for swapping the RGB channels' position based on the user's taste.
RotateImageStrictAction
ImageOperation to rotate an image by 4 common angles.
Sepia
ImageOperation to convert an image from colour to sepia.
SharpenFilter
ImageOperation to apply a Sharpen (enhancing) filter.
SobelFilter
This class implements the ImageOperation interface and applies a Sobel filter to a BufferedImage.
SoftBlurFilter
ImageOperation to apply a Soft blur filter.
SplashScreen
A class to build a splash screen with cool image Eden made.
Temperature
ImageOperation to change the 'temperature' of an image.
ThemeConfig
This class handles the configuration of themes for the application.
TooIbarActions
Represents a set of actions for a toolbar.
ViewActions
Actions provided by the View menu.
